original_text: And when he was gone out into the porch, another maid saw him, and said unto them that were there, This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth.
korean_text: 앞문까지 나아가니 다른 여종이 그를 보고 거기 있는 사람들에게 말하되 이 사람은 나사렛 예수와 함께 있었도다 하매

sentences.original_text: And when he was gone out
and said unto them that were there
This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람도 나사렛 예수와 함께 있었다
